welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Alcalde Diaz, a charming city known for its rich cultural heritage and beautiful natural landscapes. We invite you to explore and savor all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Tocumen International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Tocumen International Airport serves international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paitilla-Marcos A. Gelabert Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Paitilla-Marcos A. Gelabert Airport is used for private and charter flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Paitilla-Marcos A. Gelabert Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
